meanings.definition: The part of the brain that relays sensory signals to the cerebral cortex.
meanings.sent1: The thalamus helps send messages to the thinking part of the brain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the thalamus to understand how the brain processes information.
meanings.sent3: The thalamus must be a busy messenger, always passing notes to the brain.
meanings.sent4: Like a diligent courier, the thalamus delivers important packages of sensation.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the thalamus as a diligent secretary, ensuring all messages reach the boss.
